user.title: Connect to WhatsApp Bridge
user.description: Enter the WebSocket URL of the WhatsApp Bridge.

scan.title: Scan QR Code
scan.description:
Setup is almost complete!

Click **Submit** to finish adding the integration.

After you submit, check your **Notifications** (bell icon) for the QR code to link your WhatsApp account.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the bridge. Make sure the Node.js service is running.
error.not_ready: WhatsApp is not ready yet. Please ensure you have scanned the QR code.
error.initializing: WhatsApp client is initializing. Please try again in a few seconds.
error.no_qr_received: No QR code received. If you are already logged in, check the logs.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs.
